name: Hilton Park Munich

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: Friendly and easy check in and check out. Comfortable and clean rooms with pleasant view to the Tucherpark. Internet in your room will cost you additionally 25€ per day! Nevertheless, I recommend this Hotel for short time business trips.
reviews.title: Quiet pleasant Business Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: An excellent location by the park and the city centre is just a brisk 30 minute walk or you could use the nearby trams instead. The hotel rooms are very modern, clean and comfortable. Service is typically efficient but sometimes delivered a little brusquely.
reviews.title: Hilton Munich Park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet is excellent with a huge choice of very high quality food.
reviews.title: Good Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013
reviews.text: Hotel is typical of the high quality you would expect from a Hilton property. Location is about three miles from city center but bus and tram lines are close by. We bought public transportation day passes for bus, tram and U-Bahn and saved a lot on taxi fares. Adjoining rooms with interconnecting doors are available; great for family visits. Staff was exceptionally friendly and concierge was very helpful with advice on tours and public transportation. Right next to the English Garden; don't miss an evening at the beer garden with German band and typical German foods. Internet service was free at the public computer facility. Couldn't find anything to dislike.
reviews.title: Comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Far from center. No wifi at rooms
reviews.title: Great hotel excellent sunday brunch

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: nice Lobby, nice rooms, nice Restaurant, nice coffee bar, nice Service, everything works in a beautiful Location. great check in, the car got parked, even for free, the Internet works fast and the breakfast is perfect, the Service very good, polite staff, one of the best Hotels to stay
reviews.title: nice hotel at the english garden

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are fully renovated in a relaxed, modern style. And they are huge! Really huge! The 'Englischer Garten' with the 'Chinese Pavillon' and one of the most enjoyable beergardens in Munich is close by within a 10min walk. You can reach the city center either by bus or by taxi. I recommend to take the bus as the route is picturesque and its always fine to mingle a bit with the locals. The breakfast buffet is impressive and a fine treat in the morning. You will enjoy the nice setting and the view into the green. The fitness center is perfectly equipped and the pool and sauna are nice. Either for leisure or for business thats a perfect spot. Looking forward to my next stay.
reviews.title: Hilton at its best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed for 2 night & Enjoyed my stay at the Hilton Park Munich, Very clean and Great Service from the front desk. Excellent varieties of meats for breakfast. Housekeeping was quite quick to bring us whatever we required. Am sure to visit back.
reviews.title: Great Stay at the Hilton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I was staying in Park Hilton for 4 nights during April 2013. The stay was very pleasent.
reviews.title: Hotel to be deserved to be called Hilton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013
reviews.text: The location and the apearance of the hotel are great. The room is very comfortable and includes everything required for a night stay. Breakfast is very good. rich and tasty. the view of the small river from the dining hall worth it all!
reviews.title: Nice Hotel High Standard but ugly preparation for breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The Hilton english garden is a great hotel in a perfect location. In summer it is right beside the large park and can be a very peaceful and tranquil place to stay. It is also easy to walk across the park to find the Main Street with plenty of restaurants and cares to choose from. Just one block away you can find the tran that will take you just a few stops and less than 15 min into the center of Munich.. Perfect and easy.
reviews.title: A great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself has a great breakfast, outstanding customer service and the senior concierge who has been there for many years is extremely helpful and informative. The rooms are large clean and comfortable. They have very good gym facility's as well. They have also added free wifi thru out the lobby area.
reviews.title: Underwhelmed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are Hilton Honors members and stayed in this Hilton several years ago. Since we'd been in Europe for several weeks in B&B's and smaller boutique hotels, we were looking for somewhere with decent sized rooms and good Internet service. We got the decent sized room but the Internet service was horrible and cost 25 euros/day. That combined with the prices they charge for food, drinks and parking made this not the most pleasant stay. Plus there isn't much in the way of restaurants to walk to from here and breakfast was - are you sitting down?- 29 euros for the buffet, 19 euros if you just have the continental buffet. It's more of a business hotel. So stay here if you've been in Europe a while and need to feel the comforts of an American hotel room but otherwise I'd stay somewhere else closer to town. I will say that the staff at the front desk was very efficient and helpful with the Internet problems. TIP: The front desk will tell you that parking is 25 euros a day in their garage but we stumbled upon free parking along the road behind the hotel (where the taxis park).
reviews.title: Nice hotel and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed in the hotel before , but much later in the year , so this time the surrounding plants and trees were coming into bloom , giving it a nice look .
reviews.title: Really nice breakfast and helpfull staff, good for a short stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the rooms in the hotel appear to have balconies and our view from the 11th floor over the Englishcher Garden and Eisenban river was lovely .
reviews.title: Could Be Better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Ok, so I am a Hilton Honors member. I still speak the truth. Lets start with the rooms, spacious and clean, updated, nice bathroom, check the list- all the amenities of upscale hotel.Comfortable beds.Stayed 3 nights , 2 rooms , family of 4. Used concierge a couple of times very helpful. Front desk staff also friendly and helpful , Nice lobby lounge to have some drinks ,, can order food as well.Watched the Munich soccer final here Only had breakfast here (daily).Typical american style buffet. Omelettes to order, breads, fruits, cereals,potatoes, fish, salad, waffles.Very crowded but still sufficient, service was a little sparse. Tough to get coffee and plates cleared. We had a car and parked on the street, easy to find spaces. Hotel location was great. Near the park and easy drive around town.Boys used workout facility at night (open 24 hrs). Definitely adequate for their needs. On return to Munich. I would stay again.
reviews.title: Hilton, what I expected, excellent.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here in late May 2013 while touring Munich. The Hilton Park Munich was a great option. We chose this because it was convenient to the central town, but a little removed from the bustle. The hotel is adjacent to a large public garden and residential neighborhood. The room was nicely maintained and decorated. Photos on the hotel's web site are good representations of the common spaces as well as the rooms. We had a rental car, but never used it to see the sights in Munich because the hotel was a 20 minute walk to the old town area. If you use the hotel's parking facility, it will cost 24 euros/day but we were able to find street parking outside the hotel for free. We did not eat at the hotel because there was a great selection of restaurants nearby.
reviews.title: Spacious and lovely room in good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our last leg of travelling to Barcelona, Milan, Venice, Salzburg, and Munich, and without doubt was one of the best places we stayed in. This is a great hotel with quality rooms, service, and amenities. The staff is always extremely helpful and friendly no matter how busy they are. It is located a short cab ride from the train station (15 euro), and if you are energetic enough, you can walk into the old town area in about 45 minutes. A beautiful park backs onto the hotel but unfortunatley there is only one restaurant within walking distance from the hotel. One complaint would be that free wifi was available in the lobby but not the rooms - 25 euro per night seems excessive. Otherwise the place oozes quality, and the staff make for a great experience. I would highly recommend this hotel and would stay here again.
reviews.title: Great experience in Munchen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights during a 9 day tour of Europe.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel and facilities were excellent.
reviews.title: Super Hotel

description: The newly refurbished Hilton Munich Park hotel offers a green and quiet location next to the English Garden, Europe's largest municipal park. Munich's famous beergardens and the popular district Schwabing are within walking distance. Enjoy the spacious guest rooms with private balcony or relax in the health club with sauna and pool. Restaurant, bar, cafe, 24h gym, business centre, large conference area - the full range of business and leisure facilities is provided.
